concept.definition: The resource is a description of a knowledge module
The resource is a shareable library of formalized knowledge

description: The type of knowledge module being described
name: ModuleMetadataType

text.div:
ModuleMetadataType

The type of knowledge module being described

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/module-metadata-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
module ModuleThe resource is a description of a knowledge module
library LibraryThe resource is a shareable library of formalized knowledge
decision-support-rule Decision Support RuleAn Event-Condition-Action Rule Artifact
documentation-template Documentation TemplateA Documentation Template Artifact
order-set Order SetAn Order Set Artifact
